--- title: "Stations" author: "Wan Kee" date: "10 February 2024" date-modified: "last-modified" execute: eval: true echo: true freeze: true warning: false message: false error: true --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #library(devtools) #install_github("andrew-loh/neaSG", force = TRUE) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} pacman::p_load(tmap, sf, tidyverse, sfdep, mapview, leaflet.providers, neaSG) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} stn <- get_weatherstns() ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} glimpse(stn) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 63 Columns: 5 $ id "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50",… $ device_id "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50",… $ name "Alexandra Road", "Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5", "Banyan Ro… $ location.latitude 1.29370, 1.37640, 1.25600, 1.38240, 1.31910, 1.3800… $ location.longitude 103.8125, 103.8492, 103.6790, 103.7603, 103.8191, 1… ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} stn_sf <- st_as_sf(stn, coords = c("location.longitude", "location.latitude"), crs = 4326) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} glimpse(stn_sf) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 63 Columns: 4 $ id "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50", "S107", … $ device_id "S77", "S109", "S117", "S64", "S90", "S114", "S50", "S107", … $ name "Alexandra Road", "Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5", "Banyan Road", "Buk… $ geometry POINT (103.8125 1.2937), POINT (103.8492 1.3764), POIN… ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tmap_mode("view") tm_basemap("CartoDB.Positron") + tm_shape(stn_sf)+ tm_dots(col = "black", size = 0.1)+ tm_view(set.zoom.limits = c(11,12)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} stn_selected <- stn_sf %>% filter(id %in% c("S60", "S117", "S116", "S115", "S113", "S111", "S107", "S201", "S50", "S43", "S44", "S221", "S24", "S121", "S109", "S114", "S900", "S209", "S104")) glimpse(stn_selected) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Rows: 19 Columns: 4 $ id "S109", "S117", "S114", "S50", "S107", "S43", "S113", "S44",… $ device_id "S109", "S117", "S114", "S50", "S107", "S43", "S113", "S44",… $ name "Ang Mo Kio Avenue 5", "Banyan Road", "Choa Chu Kang Avenue … $ geometry POINT (103.8492 1.3764), POINT (103.679 1.256), POINT … ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tmap_mode("view") tm_basemap("CartoDB.Positron") + tm_shape(stn_selected)+ tm_dots(col = "black", size = 0.1) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
